values.desc: Stops and removes the loader with the given ID.

values.code: dump(prefix: String!, fd: FileDescriptor!, writer: PrintWriter!, args: Array<String!>!)
values.desc: Print the LoaderManager's state into the given stream.
Control whether the framework's internal loader manager debugging logs are turned on.
Return the Loader with the given id or null if no matching Loader is found.

values.code: initLoader(id: Int, args: Bundle!, callback: LoaderManager.LoaderCallbacks<D>!)
values.desc: Ensures a loader is initialized and active.

values.code: restartLoader(id: Int, args: Bundle!, callback: LoaderManager.LoaderCallbacks<D>!)
values.desc: Starts a new or restarts an existing android.content.Loader in this manager, registers the callbacks to it, and (if the activity/fragment is currently started) starts loading it.
Callback interface for a client to interact with the manager.
